message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $150. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your offer. I'll give you a deal for $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you halfway between my previous offer and your new offer. I'll give you a deal for $125. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?

I'm not willing to go below $120, Bob. I think that's a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your offer and my minimum price. I'll give you a deal for $117.50. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $112?
